item.title: The Art and Mathematics of Genji-Ko
item.description: You might think there’s unlikely to be any interesting mathematics arising from incense appreciation, but that’s only because you’re unfamiliar with the peculiar character of Muromachi (室町) era Japanese nobles. You see, it was a time of great insecurity and political instability, TODO Never before or after, in any place or period of history, did you have have a group of people who were so desperate to display their sophistication and refinement.
